name: A. AB Balance
statement:
You are given a string s of length n consisting of characters and/or
.Let
operatorname{AB}(s) be the number of occurrences of string in s as a .
Analogically,
operatorname{BA}(s) is the number of occurrences of in s as a .In one
step, you can choose any index i and replace s_i with character or .What
is the minimum number of steps you need to make to achieve
operatorname{AB}(s) =
operatorname{BA}(s)?The number of occurrences of string d in s as
substring is the number of indices i (1
le i
le |s| - |d| + 1) such that substring s_i s_{i + 1}
dots s_{i + |d| - 1} is equal to d. For example,
operatorname{AB}() = 2 since there are two indices i: i = 2 where and i
= 6 where .
